subject: Air Mail - Open Mid Flight DC -> BOS
content: Have a good time in Boston, love. Be Safe, Be You, Be True./r/nHey fireflies!/rFly Higher guys!/rFly high above this place./rTill a Skyrise is a wire's size./rThen fly off into space./rI catch stupid bugs in jars/rbut you're not bugs/rYou're baby stars!
